name: Chrisgilmerproj
body:
### Coding
Every day I write code at work.  I'm often patching scripts, writing new tools from scratch, or learning about and using tools that I've never seen before.  This will be a place to capture that for the future.

I also want a place where I can write code samples with good syntax highlighting:

```python
import this
```

And link to projects I find interesting: SurpriseFlowers by @swampdragons
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
